description: Request parameters for discovering creative formats provided by this creative agent

asset_types.description: Filter to formats that include these asset types. For third-party tags, search for 'html' or 'javascript'. E.g., ['image', 'text'] returns formats with images and text, ['javascript'] returns formats accepting JavaScript tags.

context.description: Initiator-provided context included in the request payload. Agentsmust echo this value back unchanged in responses and webhooks. Use for UI/session hints, correlation tokens, or tracking metadata.

format_ids.description: Return only these specific format IDs

is_responsive.description: Filter for responsive formats that adapt to container size. When true, returns formats without fixed dimensions.

max_height.description: Maximum height in pixels (inclusive). Returns formats with height <= this value. Omit for responsive/fluid formats.

max_width.description: Maximum width in pixels (inclusive). Returns formats with width <= this value. Omit for responsive/fluid formats.

min_height.description: Minimum height in pixels (inclusive). Returns formats with height >= this value.

min_width.description: Minimum width in pixels (inclusive). Returns formats with width >= this value.

name_search.description: Search for formats by name (case-insensitive partial match)

type.description: Filter by format type (technical categories with distinct requirements)

title: List Creative Formats Request (Creative Agent)
